features: ENRICHED WITH ARGAN OIL: This premium argan oil shampoo is formulated to nourish your hair from root to tip; Bingo Hair Care’s moisturizing shampoo; Enriched with Moroccan argan oil for hair, this special shampoo for dry hair gives you added shine, luster and hydration

SULFATE FREE: Upgrade to a sodium lauryl sulfate free shampoo that’s gentle on your scalp; Our shampoo for women and men contains no sulfates or parabens; What’s more, this dry hair shampoo is never tested on animals; If you’re in search of a shampoo dry hair will love, look no further than Bingo Hair Care

SMOOTHES FRIZZ: It’s time to say goodbye to unwanted flyaways, thanks to our advanced shampoo for dry hair and frizz; This Moroccan oil shampoo actively works to smooth frizzy hair and rogue strands; Achieve stunning smoothness with Bingo Hair Care’s Moroccan shampoo for damaged hair

SALON GRADE: Make shampoo for damaged hair that doesn’t live up to your expectations a thing of the past; We’ve worked with haircare experts to bring you a sulfate free shampoo that’s salon grade; More than just a curly hair shampoo, our formula is ideal for all hair types including straight, frizzy, wavy and flat

DAMAGE PROTECTION: Our Moroccan oil hair products actively work to prevent damage; The secret is how the argan oil of Morocco forms a protective coating around each strand, guarding you against exposure; Better still, this shampoo for dry damaged hair also can help to restore and repair stressed out locks

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Strengthen Hair with our Argan Oil Range for Less Breakage and Incredible Shine Shampoo & Conditioner Set Add to Cart Hydrating Mask Add to Cart Shampoo Add to Cart Conditioner Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.3 out of 5 stars 27,290 4.4 out of 5 stars 5,145 4.5 out of 5 stars 2,075 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,686 Price $26.99$26.99 $9.99$9.99 $14.99$14.99 $14.99$14.99 INTENDED USE Smooth and hydrate Intense hydration Clean buildup, smooth hair Hydrate, nourish & smooth ADDITIONAL BENEFITS Protects against damage Soft and manageable hair Amazing hydration Beautiful shine KEY INGREDIENTS Argan oil, jojoba, keratin Argan oil, keratin Argan oil, aloe, rosemary Argan oil, chamomile & keratin RESOLVES PROBLEM Dry, frizzy and brittle hair Dry and broken hair Unclean hair Dry and brittle hair FOR HAIR TYPE All hair types All hair types All hair types All hair types SUGGESTED USE Wash and rinse normally Leave in for 30 mins & rinse 60 second lather and rinse Leave for 2 minutes and rinse

Salon Formula Developed by hair care professionals to lock in shine and moisture, this salon grade argan oil shampoo is trusted by experts who demand excellence. All Hair Types Bingo Hair Care's moisturizing shampoo is ideal for men and women. It’s safe for color treated hair, as well as curly, wavy, frizzy and straight. Smoothes Frizz Achieve the sleek beautiful hair you've always wanted with our Moroccan oil products. Crafted specifically to smooth frizz, and stop flyaways. Stops Breakage Broken hair and split ends are over, thanks to our shampoo for dry hair. Moroccan argan oil works to fortify brittle hair and prevent breakage.

Is this safe to use with color treated hair? Yes. This shampoo is powerful on grime and buildup but gentle on color treated hair. It won’t strip your hair of color and can also be used on hair that has been bleached. Can I still blow dry my hair after washing? Yes. This shampoo is fine to use in combination with blow drying. In fact the Moroccan argan oil is ideal for guarding against damage from heat and forms a protective coating around each individual strand. Isn’t the oil going to weigh my hair down and make it limp? Our argan shampoo and conditioner effectively repairs and safeguards hair from damage. The key lies in the deep penetration of argan oil on a cellular level, to nourish each strand and form a protective shield for ongoing protection. Won’t the oil weigh my hair down? No. In fact many observe increased hair volume with our Moroccan argan shampoo. The secret is how the oil coats each strand and increases volume between the hair. Suitable for all hair types: wavy, frizzy, straight, and color-treated. Will this help my brittle and rough hair? Yes. People report experiencing enhanced manageability with each wash of our Moroccan argan shampoo. Crafted with argan oil, rosemary, and jojoba extracts, this salon grade formula has been created specifically for smoothing and softening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great shampoo for the price just wish it came in larger bottles. I actually stopped using this just to change it up. Went back to it because I noticed my brush started filling quickly with hair. So did my vacuum 🥴

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s makes my curls look beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I love that it made my curls soft and not frizzy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is a great shampoo. I have very thin, frizzy, color treated hair that has been through a lot. It's really hard for me find a good shampoo. This feels very moisturizing almost like it's a conditioner. I like the smell and even the pump. I rarely buy shampoo a second time, because not many products like my hair, but I'm pretty sure I will buy this again when it's out. I noticed I could probably use half the amount, but I'm so conditioned to use a certain amount of shampoo in my hand I forget whenever I wash my hair. It seems a little bit will go a long way so you will get more bang for your buck. Definitely recommend for any who feel their hair is dried out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong healthy hair but not that color safe
reviews.reviewText: I had this shampoo for 3 weeks and I really like the scent. I wanted an organic shampoo because I thought it would reduce the chances of color being stripped from my hair. This year I bleached my hair to a really high level platinum blonde and I had it color treated to a brown so my hair quality is fried and super tangled. The shampoo is honestly magical, the first time I used it I could feel it enriching my hair and I really didn't need any conditioner. It detangles my hair and I do see the results of my hair being strengthened over time. I've stopped combing my hair since it's so fragile and the 2 pics show the before and after. However, I am a little unhappy that it claims to be safe for color treated hair but after a couple of washes, I do notice the brown fading and my hair turning lighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that I don't need to use more than a dime-sized amount to wash my short hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scalp does not itch!
reviews.reviewText: I have been having trouble with all my shampoos. I tried this one while visiting my sister, and it worked to stop my scalp from itching. I looked it up in Amazon and fortunately I found and ordered it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: moroccan oil shampoo have been a long time favorite of mine. This shampoo won’t fail! I have no cons to mention, only pro comments!1. Smells so wonderful!!2. Cleans your hair while protecting it!3. Your hair can skip shampooing and smell as wonderful as a fresh shampooing days later!4. It’s thick, sulfate free and doesn’t damage coarse thick hair. (My hair is curly, coarse and frizzy)5. Gives a nice smooth shiny finish!6 .your bathroom will smell like a spa after using!I love the blue and orange colors used by the moroccan organ oil products. Gives a pretty look in the shower or on your bathtub. Enjoy the best of the best! Wonderful product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great to greasy.
reviews.reviewText: I waited until I used almost the entire bottle before leaving this review.Initially this shampoo has a slight odor, but that did not bother me since it wasn’t very strong, nor did it linger. There is no lather which took some getting used to. The trick for getting a bit of a lather is to split your shampoo into sections of your hair and to add more water, not more shampoo. I have always only applied shampoo to the top and crown areas and conditioner to the bottom. After only 2 uses my hair felt clean, airy and I could have sworn it also felt thicker. I loved it! After a week into using it I noticed that as I parted or flipped my hair over there were sections that looked greasy and clumpy. Figuring it was the argan oil I am not used to, I spent a bit more time rinsing out sections of my hair. The clean airy feeling of my hair was no longer there. If I had plans after work my hair looked and felt greasy and flatter than usual. I have long hip length, thinner hair so volume is usually non-existent, but this was getting worse. When my husband described it as greasy and gritty, I was done.I really wanted this shampoo to work and I think that I gave it a fair chance with suggestions made by others using sulfate/argan oil shampoo. I gave up on using it with about an inch left in the bottle. I tried! Maybe I will try another sulfate free without the oil. I gave it 3 stars for quick delivery, nice pump and the few days I loved my hair. The search continues.
